CustomField.description: If checked, when the user is scheduling a resource on a task - either from the task schedule page or from the resource planner on a task then warning message is display if overbooked
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, when the user is scheduling a resource on a task - either from the task schedule page or from the resource planner on a task then warning message is display if overbooked
CustomField.label: Warn on Over-Scheduling
